name: Semantix
overview: Semantix AB provides language and communication services for manufacturing, telecommunications, medical technology, and software industries in Europe. It offers translation, text editing, project management, layout, and documentation design services; training services, such as open and adapted courses, seminars and lectures, personal instruction, and information mapping; and language consulting services, which include proofreading and editing, writing, and communication analysis and language advise. The company also provides Web communication services, including Web content, information design, and search engine optimization; and interpretation services, such as face-to-face and telephone interpretation, and business and conference interpretation. Semantix AB was formerly known as Lantz International and changed its name to Semantix AB in February 2006. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden with additional offices in Malmï¿½, Gothenburg, Uppsala, Umea, and Norrkï¿½ping, Sweden; Helsinki, Finland; and Norway.
